p.if: If you are male, increase your MAGIC rating by one permanently, and immediately.

section.p: If you are female, the unicorn nuzzles you tenderly. It stares into your eyes with its own dewy, innocent gaze. You have a purity of spirit that has captivated the creature.
The unicorn has given you an important insight into the nature of holiness. Gain one point of MAGIC and one point of CHARISMA, permanently, and .
